Control Name: 4.2 Ensure Object Storage Buckets are encrypted with a Customer Managed Key (CMK)
Control Statement: Encryption of Object Storage buckets with a Customer Managed Key (CMK) provides an additional level of security on your data by allowing you to manage your own encryption key lifecycle management for the bucket.
